Posts.Content: Not sure don’t think it panicking I was sent home from work last night I was so sick like felt like been sick and was gasping for breath and the colour from my face went from been health to grey.. up to this morning don’t feel as bad just feel tired and my tummy is upset.. but breathless has left me.. so I am going to wait to tomorrow and hope and trust in god that all is just fine and This is just a bug I have taken at the time of discovery of the lump thanks for your words means a lot ❤️ Xx
Posts.Title: Signs of cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks Lesley will keep u updated ❤️
Posts.Title: Signs of cancer

Posts.Content: Breast cancer.. the past 8 weeks I had like eczema looking rash on my boobs went to doctors last Wednesday she found a lump on my left breast.. since then at night I been feeling very sick breathless and shivering and not eating and feeling like an going to be sick am really worried I am going to breast clinic on Wednesday to get screened and feeling very worried of the news I will get age 33 mother of 5
